faqsPage.contactSectionTitle: Couldn't find the answer you need?

order-1.question: How do I place an order?
order-1.answer: You can place an order directly on our website through the Order page. Select the appropriate meal plan, fill in your personal information and delivery address, then proceed to payment to complete your order.

order-2.question: What is the delivery time?
order-2.answer: We deliver from 6:00 AM - 9:00 PM daily. You can choose a suitable delivery time slot when placing your order.

order-3.question: Can I cancel my order?
order-3.answer: You can cancel your order up to 4 hours before the estimated delivery time. Please contact us via hotline for assistance.

payment-1.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment-1.answer: We accept payments via bank cards, e-wallets (Momo, ZaloPay), and cash on delivery.

payment-2.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied with the meal?
payment-2.answer: We are committed to ensuring meal quality. If there is a quality issue, please contact us within 2 hours of receiving your order for assistance.

menu-1.question: Is the menu updated regularly?
menu-1.answer: Our menu is updated weekly to ensure variety and seasonal appropriateness.

menu-2.question: How can I find nutritional information for the dishes?
menu-2.answer: Detailed nutritional information for each dish is displayed on the website when you select an item.

menu-3.question: Can I customize the menu according to my needs?
menu-3.answer: Yes, you can customize your menu according to your personal dietary needs when subscribing to the Premium plan.

other-1.question: Is there a nutrition consultation service?
other-1.answer: Yes, we provide free nutrition consultation services for customers who subscribe to the Advanced and Premium plans.

other-2.question: How can I contact support?
other-2.answer: You can contact us via hotline 1900-xxxx or email support@chayfood.vn
